Package Model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddMessage
    Description of AddMessage: This is where you write the texts that you choose to display to other users that are editing the same document.
    ChatClient
    Description of ChatClient: This is the class that has the client that operates the users interactions between the chats.
    ChatPanel
    Description of ChatPanel: This is the chat panel that has the functions to talk to different users and give input through a text box and send messages.
    ChatServer
    Description of ChatServer: This class is a server that is private for the chat only, may be in a separate pop up, but we are still seeing whether we want to build it into the original GUI.
    Command
    Description of Command: This is an abstract class that is one of the main components of the connectivity.
    ConnectToServer
    Description of ConnectToServer: In this class, this is where we actually connect to the server.
    DisconnectChat
    Description of DisconnectChat: This is the class that lets you disconnect the chat server and leave that area.
    Document
    Description of Document: This is a class that interacts with the user and creates an initial document under their profile allowing the user to edit using text editor and let revisions exist.
    LoginServer
    Description of LoginServer: This class is just the initial login connecting to the server for the collaborative editing tool.
    LoginWindow
    Description of LoginWindow: This is a class for logging in and creating a new user.
    MainText
    Description of MainText: This class is the area/layout that document is edited.
    MainWindow
    Description of MainWindow: This is the main window for the entire program that is connected to the GUI that has functionality to edit, etc.
    MenuBar
    Description of MenuBar: This is the main bar at the top of the GUI that has the File, Edit, and About buttons that are the main parts of the outside MenuBar.
    RevisionAtTime
    Description of RevisionAtTime: This is the revision done at real time and updated with a username as well as the real time of when it was edited and it inherits the RevisionElement to see what has been edited.
    RevisionElement
    Description of RevisionElement: This is the part of the document that has been edited (content).
    RevisionList
    Description of RevisionList: This is a list of the revisions made by a given user.
    Revisions
    Description of Revisions: This class records the revisions made.
    TextEditor
    Description of TextEditor: This class is all the different functions that allow the user to manipulate and change style of texts.
    ToolBar
    Description of ToolBar: This class interacts with the text editor and has the features built into this toolbar of bold, italics, size, type of font, etc.
    UpdateChatClient
    Description of UpdateChatClient: This is the class that updates the chat area and shows what users are saying and displays in the chat panel.
    User
    Description of User: This is the class where a user profile exists.
